title: Other World Encounters
intro: An investigator on a space containing a Gate may choose to complete an Other World Encounter; Other World Encounters are the primary way in which investigators close Gates. Other World Encounters are complex encounters; the pass effect usually allows players to close the Gate that they are on. The fail effect may allow the investigator to still close the Gate if they pass a test, but more often than not the fail effect will only allow them to pass through unharmed if they succeed. Some effects can occur when resolving Other World Encounters: The most common skill test in Other World Encounters are and . During the fail effect, is also a semi-frequent test.
